title: Okyxas: Ultimate Anime Gacha
description: Unleash the excitement of anime gacha packs! Collect beautifully designed cards featuring your favorite characters and discover rare treasures as you build your collection.

title: Unpack & Discover
description: Open gacha packs with stunning animations and uncover unique, rare cards. Every pack is a chance to add something extraordinary.

title: Trade & Build Your Deck
description: Trade cards with players worldwide, complete sets, and create your ultimate anime collection. Okyxas makes trading simple, fun, and rewarding!
